item.title: Aspose.3D for Java 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.3D for Java 24.1. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category THREEDNET-1471 Euler angle based animation to quaternion based animation conversion Task THREEDNET-1474 Allow export quaternion-based animation in FBX Task THREEDNET-1475 Animation export in GLTF Task THREEDNET-1476 Allow export euler-based rotation animation to glTF Improvement THREEDNET-1478 Add support for 3MF with assembled structure.
